element.short: The fluentpath expression to be evaluated
element.definition: The fluentpath expression to be evaluated against the request or response message contents - HTTP headers and payload.
element.comment: If both "expression" and a "fixtureId" are specified, then the expression will be evaluated against the request or response body mapped to the fixtureId.  If "expression" is specified and a "fixtureId" is not, then the expression will be evaluated against the response body of the last operation.  Test engines are to store the request and response body and headers of the last operation at all times for subsequent assertions.
